feed-goats-1-chobani-goat-feed.name: Feed goats 1 chobani of goat feed

feed-chickens-1-chobani-chicken-feed-col.name: Feed chickens 1 chobani of chicken feed + cold treats

feed-chicks-1-mug-chick-starter-crumbles.name: Feed chicks 1 mug of chick starter crumbles + cold treats

dump-refill-house-side-water-bucket.name: Dump and refill house-side water bucket

dump-refill-inside-water-bucket.name: Dump and refill inside water bucket

uncoop-chickens.name: let the chickens out of the coop and wedge the coop door open so that it blocks the afternoon sun from the barn

fill-fish-pond-to-top.name: Fill fish pond (when full, it starts flowing into chicken coop area)

bring-in-nest-ice.name: Bring in plastic bottles from nests and put in freezer

feed-xena-1-3-chobani-dog-food-1-scoop-c.name: Feed Xena 1/3 Chobani Dog food + 1 scoop cold food

feed-huey-1-3-chobani-dog-food-1-scoop-c.name: Feed Huey 1/3 Chobani Dog food + 1 scoop cold food

feed-pajama-1-3-chobani-dog-food-1-scoop.name: Feed Pajama 1/3 Chobani Dog food + 1 scoop cold food

check-bedroom-water-bowl-full.name: Check that each (of the 2) bedroom water bowl is full

let-each-dog-out-go-potty.name: Let each dog out to go potty

run-water-now-10-mins-garage-side-yard-h.name: run 'water now' 10 mins on garage side yard hose timer

water-raised-garden-bed-tomatoes-garage-.name: move garage side yard hose to raised tomato bed and water until floding below

set-hose-by-pomegranate-bush-run-10-mins.name: set hose by pomegranate bush and run 10 mins

set-hose-by-tangerine-tree-run-10-mins.name: set hose by tangerine tree and run 10 mins

water-raised-bed-back-door.name: water raised bed by back door

water-potted-plants-back-side-house.name: water potted mint and garlic back side of house

set-hose-back-garden-bed-10-mins.name: set hose in back garden bed 10 mins

add-1-chobani-ice-house-side-water-bucke.name: Add 1 chobani of Ice to house-side water bucket

add-1-chobani-ice-ice-house-water-bucket.name: Add 1 chobani of Ice to ice-house water bucket

collect-gallon-water-container-ice-house.name: Collect gallon of water container from ice-house

add-24-32-oz-ice-bottle-front-chicken-ne.name: Add 24-32 oz ice bottle to front chicken nest

add-24-32-oz-ice-bottle-back-chicken-nes.name: Add 24-32 oz ice bottle to back chicken nest

gather-eggs-both nests.name: Gather eggs from each nest (the chickens are mostly fine with you reaching under them, but they may growl and nip)

give-goats-dead-broccoli-plant.name: Give goats a dead broccoli plant

give-chickens-chicks-frozen-corn-treats.name: Give chickens and chicks frozen corn treats

feed-goats-2-handfuls-goat-feed-and-a-br.name: Feed goats 2 handfuls of goat feed (1 handful each)

feed-chickens-1-chobani-chicken-feed-col.name: Feed chickens 1 chobani of chicken feed + cold treats

feed-chicks-1-mug-chick-starter-crumbles.name: Feed chicks 1 mug of chick starter crumbles + cold treats

add-1-chobani-ice-house-side-water-bucke.name: Add 1 chobani of Ice to house-side water bucket

add-1-chobani-ice-inside-water-bucket.name: Add 1 chobani of Ice to inside water bucket

add-1-chobani-ice-ice-house-water-bucket.name: Add 1 chobani of Ice to ice-house water bucket

feed-xena-1-3-chobani-dog-food-1-scoop-c.name: Feed Xena 1/3 Chobani Dog food + 1 scoop cold food

feed-huey-1-3-chobani-dog-food-1-scoop-c.name: Feed Huey 1/3 Chobani Dog food + 1 scoop cold food

feed-pajama-1-3-chobani-dog-food-1-scoop.name: Feed Pajama 1/3 Chobani Dog food + 1 scoop cold food

check-that-water-bowls-in-each-bedroom-a.name: check that water bowls in each bedroom are full

let-each-dog-out-go-potty-2.name: Let each dog out to go potty

feed-goats-1-handfuls-goat-feed.name: Feed goats 1 handfuls of goat feed (1/2 handful each)

feed-chicks-1-mug-chick-starter-crumbles.name: Feed chicks 1 mug of chick starter crumbles + cold treats

feed-chickens-cold-treats-then-bed.name: Feed chickens cold treats inside the coop to get them to go inside (or catch them and put them in if needed)

add-1-chobani-ice-inside-water-bucket-2.name: Add 1 chobani of Ice to inside water bucket

add-1-chobani-ice-ice-house-water-bucket.name: Add 1 chobani of Ice to ice-house water bucket
